name: fire-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.x-y: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
